attributes.action: Schools closure or  giving option of online classes..
attributes.additional_details: Because so many parents are vulnerable so they scared sending kids to school during pandamic and don't want to take any risk.
attributes.background: Government should give permission for parents for online schooling.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740
